author: Natasha Lomas
title: Kry launches free service for doctors to do video consultations during COVID-19 crisis
description: Swedish telehealth startup Kry has launched a tool for healthcare professionals to conduct remote consultations during the coronavirus pandemic. Calls for EU citizens to self isolate to reduce the spread of COVID-19 is driving major demand for video appointme…
